act:
1281598 THE SPECIAL TRIBUNALS (SUPPLEMENTARY PROVISIONS) REPEAL ACT, 2004
NO. 28 OF 2004 [ 24th December, 2004.]
An Act to repeal the Special Tribunals (Supplementary Provisions) Act, 1946.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Fifty- fifth Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
689401 1Short title.- This Act may be called the Special Tribunals (Supplementary Provisions) Repeal Act, 2004.
1729892 2Repeal of Act 26 of 1946.- The Special Tribunals (Supplementary Provisions) Act, 1946 is hereby repealed. T. K. VISWANATHAN, Secy. to the Govt. of India.
